Title: Maintain a clean environment, safeguard good order
Publisher: Hubei meishu chubanshe (湖北美术出版社), Wuhan
Notes: This poster is in the collection only in digital format. It is part of a 6-poster series with the title 讲文明树新风宣传画 (Jiang wenming shu xinfeng xuanchuan hua, Talk about civilization and create a new style propaganda posters).
